column5: I searched on aquaviews site and others,no luck at all.Where can I get one?I know I can use a cam corder with an A/V input, but I prefer to get aquaviews recorder.Any help would be great.Thanks in advance.Vince
cabelas US was clearing them out a month or so ago for $50...  looked on their site and they no longer even sell it...
At this point I have a camcorder that has an external jack... then I capture from there.
What happened, you get tired of hauling out your TV, VCR and Honda generator.
LOL.. You should have seen what I had to do originally....
I sort of recall the early set up. You either had to scale down or get a bigger boat.
